description: Model Validation Report analysis using QA gap analyzer and workflow router

compliance.description: Model validation shows missing required sections and incomplete sections
compliance.field_desc: Compliance score from 0-5 based on section completeness

coverage.description: Validation covers percentage of required sections based on model characteristics
coverage.field_desc: Coverage score from 0-5 based on section coverage

clarity.description: Review structure follows standard format with sufficient detail
clarity.field_desc: Clarity score from 0-5 based on documentation quality

challenge.description: Evidence of independent challenge and validation
challenge.field_desc: Challenge score from 0-5 based on independent validation
